features.title: Customer Search Bar
features.author: Dragos
features.description: Basic search functionality for finding customers
items: Search by Name or Phone - Type to find matching customers
Dropdown Results - See matches as you type
View Profile - Click to see customer details
Customer Info - Shows booking history, contact info, and notes
Faster Lookup - Saves time finding customer records

features.title: Call Volume Graph
features.author: Tanmay
features.description: Simple graph showing daily call data
items: Daily Call Count - See how many calls came in each day
Stacked Bar Chart - View by type or booking status
Daily Stats - Shows total calls, bookable calls, booked appointments
Booking Gaps - See difference between bookable and booked
Basic Trends - View patterns over time

features.title: Speed to Lead Texting
features.author: Team
features.description: Enhanced lead engagement with automated text messaging
items: Call First, Text on No Answer - Automatically initiates a call, and if there's no pickup, sends a 2-way bookable text
Smart Follow-up - Intelligent prompting to guide prospects toward booking appointments
Seamless Booking Integration - Direct booking capabilities within the text conversation
Response Tracking - Monitor text engagement and conversion rates
features.note: Optional feature to initiate with text before calling is planned for future release.

features.title: Outbound Maintenance Texting
features.author: Team
features.description: Goal-based texting campaigns for maintenance and follow-ups
items: Batch Text Campaigns - Send 2-way bookable texts in controlled batches
Goal-Based Progression - Check campaign goals before sending next batch
Smart Scheduling - Configure optimal send times for your audience
Retry via Call - Fallback to phone calls for non-responsive text recipients
Performance Tracking - Monitor batch performance and goal achievement
features.note: Successfully demoed with Golden Rule on August 6th.

features.title: Texting Infrastructure
features.author: Team
features.description: Major infrastructure improvements for texting capabilities
items: Multi-Tenant Awareness - All texts now properly handle existing Twilio tenant vs ISV subaccount configurations
Messaging Service Integration - Twilio Messaging Service SIDs work seamlessly without manual intervention
Use Case Mapping - Phone numbers are intelligently mapped to specific use cases
Phone Number Provisioning - New admin console for easier number management
Split Tenant Support - Customers can have Responder in one tenant and Texting in another

features.title: Texting UI
features.author: Team
features.description: New user interface for managing text conversations
items: New Table Flow - Redesigned conversation view for better text management
Enhanced Visibility - Clear overview of all ongoing text conversations
Improved Navigation - Easier access to conversation history and details
Performance Optimized - Faster loading and real-time updates
features.note: Successfully demoed internally on August 4th and 6th.

features.title: New Dashboard Experience
features.description: A completely redesigned dashboard that brings clarity and actionable insights to your fingertips
items: Real-time performance metrics
AI-powered insights and recommendations
Team leaderboards and individual scorecards
Mobile-optimized for on-the-go management

features.title: Customer Journey Mapping
features.description: Visualize and understand every customer interaction across their entire lifecycle
items: Timeline View - See every call, text, email, and chat in chronological order
Interaction Analytics - Understand sentiment and outcomes at each touchpoint
Journey Stages - Track customers from first contact through loyalty
Drop-off Analysis - Identify where customers disengage and why
Predictive Insights - AI predicts next best actions for each customer

features.title: Revenue Intelligence via Integration
features.description: Deep integration with your CRM and field service management tools to unlock powerful revenue insights
items: Conversation-to-Revenue Tracking - Connect every customer interaction directly to closed deals
Win/Loss Analysis - AI analyzes why deals close or fall through based on communication patterns
Revenue Forecasting - Predict monthly and quarterly revenue based on pipeline activity
ROI by Channel - Understand which communication channels drive the most revenue

features.title: Lead Pipelines Funnels (Marketing Funnel)
features.description: Transform how you visualize our existing lead pipelines with pipeline management
items: Visual Pipeline Stages - View leads through customizable stages
Automated Lead Scoring - AI scores leads based on interaction quality and intent
Smart Follow-up Sequences - Automated nurture campaigns based on lead behavior
Pipeline Velocity Tracking - Monitor how quickly leads move through stages
Conversion Analytics - Understand what actions drive conversions at each stage
Team Assignment Rules - Automatically route leads to the right team members
Integration with Speed-to-Lead - Seamlessly connect instant response with long-term nurture

features.title: Lead Prioritization
features.description: Basic lead scoring and routing features
items: Lead Scoring - Assign priority scores to leads
Team Distribution - Route leads to available team members
Response Tracking - Monitor how fast leads are contacted
Follow-up Reminders - Automated alerts for lead follow-ups

features.title: Performance Analytics
items: Performance Forecasts - Simple predictions of team metrics
Coaching Suggestions - Basic recommendations for each team member
Trend Reports - View team performance patterns
Development Plans - Templates for staff improvement
